member.name: T:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.FrameCapture
member.summary: Provides some common methods for capturing and saving Kinect frames to disk.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.FrameCapture.Save(System.Windows.Media.ImageSource,System.String)
member.summary: Captures the specified image source and saves it to the specified location.
member.param: The desired file path, including file name and extension, for the new image. Currently, JPEG and PNG formats are supported.
member.returns: True if the bitmap file was successfully saved. False otherwise.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.FrameCapture.Save(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Saves the specified JSON content to the specified location.
member.param: The destination path for the JSON file.
member.returns: True if the bitmap file was successfully saved. False otherwise.

member.summary: The Y axis.

member.summary: The Z axis.

member.summary: Kinect DPI.

member.summary: Default format.

member.summary: Bytes per pixel.

member.summary: Represents the visualization mode.

member.summary: Color mode (1920x1080).

member.summary: Depth mode (512x424).

member.summary: Infrared mode (512x424).

member.name: T:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions
member.summary: Provides some common functionality for manipulating color frames.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions._colorBitmapGenerator
member.summary: The color bitmap creator.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions._depthBitmapGenerator
member.summary: The depth bitmap creator.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions._infraredBitmapGenerator
member.summary: The color bitmap creator.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions._greenScreenBitmapGenerator
member.summary: The background removal generator.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions._capture
member.summary: The bitmap capture utility.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions.ToBitmap(Microsoft.Kinect.ColorFrame)
member.summary: Converts the specified color frame to a bitmap image.
member.returns: The bitmap representation of the current frame.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions.ToBitmap(Microsoft.Kinect.DepthFrame)
member.summary: Converts the specified depth frame to a bitmap image.
member.returns: The bitmap representation of the current frame.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions.ToBitmap(Microsoft.Kinect.DepthFrame,Microsoft.Kinect.BodyIndexFrame)
member.summary: Converts the specified depth and infrared frames to a bitmap image with the players highlighted.
member.returns: The bitmap representation of the current frame.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions.ToBitmap(Microsoft.Kinect.InfraredFrame)
member.summary: Converts the specified infrared frame to a bitmap image.
member.returns: The bitmap representation of the current frame.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions.GreenScreen(Microsoft.Kinect.ColorFrame,Microsoft.Kinect.DepthFrame,Microsoft.Kinect.BodyIndexFrame)
member.summary: Removes the background of the specified frames and generates a new bitmap (green-screen effect).
member.returns: The bitmap representation of the generated frame.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions.GreenScreen(Microsoft.Kinect.DepthFrame,Microsoft.Kinect.ColorFrame,Microsoft.Kinect.BodyIndexFrame)
member.summary: Removes the background of the specified frames and generates a new bitmap (green-screen effect).
member.returns: The bitmap representation of the generated frame.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions.GreenScreen(Microsoft.Kinect.BodyIndexFrame,Microsoft.Kinect.ColorFrame,Microsoft.Kinect.DepthFrame)
member.summary: Removes the background of the specified frames and generates a new bitmap (green-screen effect).
member.returns: The bitmap representation of the generated frame.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions.Save(System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap,System.String)
member.summary: Saves the specified bitmap to the specified location.
member.param: The destination path for the new image. JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP and TIFF formats are supported.
member.returns: True if the bitmap file was successfully saved. False otherwise.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions.Save(Microsoft.Kinect.ColorFrame,System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified color frame to a bitmap and saves it to the specified location.
member.param: The destination path for the new image. JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP and TIFF formats are supported.
member.returns: True if the frame was successfully saved. False otherwise.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions.Save(Microsoft.Kinect.DepthFrame,System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified depth frame to a bitmap and saves it to the specified location.
member.param: The destination path for the new image. JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP and TIFF formats are supported.
member.returns: True if the frame was successfully saved. False otherwise.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions.Save(Microsoft.Kinect.InfraredFrame,System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified infrared frame to a bitmap and saves it to the specified location.
member.param: The destination path for the new image. JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP and TIFF formats are supported.
member.returns: True if the frame was successfully saved. False otherwise.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BitmapExtensions.Save(Microsoft.Kinect.DepthFrame,Microsoft.Kinect.BodyIndexFrame,System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified depth and body index frames to a bitmap and saves it to the specified location.
member.param: The destination path for the new image. JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP and TIFF formats are supported.
member.returns: True if the image was successfully saved. False otherwise.

member.name: T:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BodyExtensions
member.summary: Provides some common functionality for manupulating body data.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BodyExtensions._bodies
member.summary: The body collection a Kinect sensor can recognize.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BodyExtensions._capture
member.summary: The frame capture utility.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BodyExtensions.Bodies(Microsoft.Kinect.BodyFrame)
member.summary: Returns the bodies found in the current frame.
member.param: The BodyFrame generated by the Kinect sensor.
member.returns: An array of bodies or an empty array if no bodies were found.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BodyExtensions.Closest(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.Kinect.Body})
member.summary: Returns the body that is currently to the sensor.
member.param: A list of bodies to look at.
member.returns: The first tracked body.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BodyExtensions.IsStable(Microsoft.Kinect.Body,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Determines whether the current body is stable, without leaning.
member.param: The accepted lean bound in the X axis. Defaults to 0.2
The accepted lean bound in the Y axis. Defaults to 0.3.
member.returns: True if the body is stable. False if the body is leaning on one side.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BodyExtensions.Height(Microsoft.Kinect.Body)
member.summary: Retruns the height of the current body.
member.returns: The height of the body in meters.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BodyExtensions.UpperHeight(Microsoft.Kinect.Body)
member.summary: Returns the upper height of the current body (head to waist).
member.returns: The upper height of the body in meters.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BodyExtensions.TrackedJoints(Microsoft.Kinect.Body,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a collection of the tracked joints of the current body.
member.param: True to include the joints with a TrackingState of Tracked or Inferred. False to include only the joints with a TrackingState of Tracked.
member.returns: A collection of the tracked joints.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BodyExtensions.Save(Microsoft.Kinect.BodyFrame,System.String)
member.summary: Serializes the bodies of the current and saves the file to the specified location.
member.returns: True if the frame was successfully saved. False otherwise.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BodyExtensions.Save(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.Kinect.Body},System.String)
member.summary: Serializes the current collection of and saves the file to the specified location.
member.returns: True if the body collection was successfully saved. False otherwise.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BodyExtensions.Save(Microsoft.Kinect.Body,System.String)
member.summary: Serializes the current and saves the file to the specified location.
member.returns: True if the body was successfully saved. False otherwise.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BodyExtensions.Save(Microsoft.Kinect.Joint,System.String)
member.summary: Serializes the current and saves the file to the specified location.
member.returns: True if the joint was successfully saved. False otherwise.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BodyExtensions.NumberOfTrackedJoints(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.Kinect.Joint})
member.summary: Calculates the number of the tracked joints from the current collection.
member.returns: The number of the accurately tracked joints.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.BodyExtensions.NumberOfTrackedJoints(Microsoft.Kinect.Joint[])
member.summary: Calculates the number of the tracked joints from the specified collection.
member.returns: The number of the accurately tracked joints.

member.name: T:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.MathExtensions
member.summary: Provides some common mathematical extensions for Kinect data.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.MathExtensions.ToRadians(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts the specified angle from degrees to radians.
member.returns: The same angle in radians.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.MathExtensions.ToDegrees(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts the specified angle from radians to degrees.
member.returns: The same angle in degrees.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.MathExtensions.ToPoint(System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D)
member.summary: Converts the specified vector into a 2-D point.
member.returns: The corresponding 2-D point.

member.summary: Converts the specified CameraSpacePoint into a 2-D point.
member.param: The type of the conversion (color, depth, or infrared).
The CoordinateMapper to make the conversion.
member.returns: The corresponding 2-D point.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.MathExtensions.ToPoint(Microsoft.Kinect.CameraSpacePoint,LightBuzz.Vitruvius.Visualization)
member.summary: Converts the specified CameraSpacePoint into a 2-D point.
member.param: The type of the conversion (color, depth, or infrared).
member.returns: The corresponding 2-D point.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.MathExtensions.ToPoint(Microsoft.Kinect.ColorSpacePoint)
member.summary: Converts the specified ColorSpacePoint into a 2-D point.
member.returns: The corresponding 2-D point.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.MathExtensions.ToPoint(Microsoft.Kinect.DepthSpacePoint)

member.summary: Hands joined in front of chest.

member.summary: Waving using the right hand.

member.summary: Waving using the left hand.

member.summary: Hand slightly bent above hip (XBOX-like gesture).

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.GestureType.SwipeLeft
member.summary: Hand moved horizontally from right to left.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.GestureType.SwipeRight
member.summary: Hand moved horizontally from left to right.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.GestureType.SwipeUp
member.summary: Hand moved vertically from hip center to head.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.GestureType.SwipeDown
member.summary: Hand moved vertically from head to hip center.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.GestureType.ZoomIn
member.summary: Both hands extended closer to the chest.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Vitruvius.GestureType.ZoomOut
member.summary: Both hands extended farther from the chest.
